HI THERE. WE'RE DISCOVERY WORKS

vibecoding ergonomics lab

Picks and shovels for the vibe-coding frontier.

  • Phenotheme
    Deterministic non-standard IDE theming for when you're developing too many apps at once.
  • Port of call
    Deterministic non-standard port number assignment for when you're developing too many apps at once.
  • Finesse
    Want to vibecode using XP principles? Finesse is like taskmaster, but XP-opinionated.
